name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: Latest iPhone with titanium design, A17 Pro chip, and advanced camera system. Features 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, Action Button, and USB-C connectivity. Available in Natural Titanium, Blue Titanium, White Titanium, and Black Titanium.
specifications: 6.1-inch display, A17 Pro chip, 128GB storage, Triple camera system

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: Premium Android smartphone with S Pen, 200MP camera, and AI-powered features. 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with 120Hz refresh rate. Built-in S Pen for productivity and creativity.
specifications: 6.8-inch display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, 256GB storage, 200MP main camera

name: Google Pixel 8
description: Google's flagship phone with advanced AI photography, pure Android experience, and Tensor G3 chip. Features Magic Eraser, Best Take, and Audio Magic Eraser for perfect photos and videos.
specifications: 6.2-inch display, Tensor G3 chip, 128GB storage, Dual camera system

name: MacBook Pro 14-inch M3
description: Professional laptop with M3 chip, Liquid Retina XDR display, and all-day battery life. Perfect for creative professionals and developers. Features advanced thermal design and studio-quality mics.
specifications: 14-inch Liquid Retina XDR, M3 chip, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus
description: Ultra-thin laptop with 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display, 12th Gen Intel processors, and premium design. Features haptic touchpad and capacitive function row for modern computing experience.
specifications: 13.4-inch display, Intel i7-1280P, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD

name: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14
description: Gaming laptop with AMD Ryzen 9 processor, NVIDIA RTX 4060 graphics, and AniMe Matrix LED display. Compact 14-inch form factor with powerful performance for gaming and content creation.
specifications: 14-inch QHD display, AMD Ryzen 9 7940HS, 16GB RAM, RTX 4060

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon
description: Business ultrabook with legendary ThinkPad reliability, 14-inch display, and enterprise security features. Ultra-lightweight carbon fiber construction with military-grade durability testing.
specifications: 14-inch WUXGA, Intel i7-1365U, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD

name: iPad Pro 12.9-inch M2
description: Most advanced iPad with M2 chip, Liquid Retina XDR display, and support for Apple Pencil 2nd generation. Perfect for professional creative work, note-taking, and entertainment.
specifications: 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR, M2 chip, 128GB storage, Wi-Fi 6E

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9+
description: Premium Android tablet with S Pen included, 12.4-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, and DeX mode for desktop-like productivity. Water-resistant design with all-day battery life.
specifications: 12.4-inch display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2, 256GB storage, S Pen included

name: AirPods Pro 2nd Generation
description: Premium wireless earbuds with Active Noise Cancellation, Spatial Audio, and Adaptive Transparency. Features H2 chip for enhanced audio quality and longer battery life with MagSafe charging case.
specifications: Active Noise Cancellation, H2 chip, 6 hours playback, MagSafe case

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Industry-leading noise canceling headphones with exceptional sound quality, 30-hour battery life, and premium comfort. Features Speak-to-Chat technology and multipoint connection.
specifications: Noise canceling, 30-hour battery, Bluetooth 5.2, Quick Charge

name: Bose QuietComfort 45
description: Comfortable over-ear headphones with world-class noise cancellation and balanced sound. Features TriPort acoustic architecture and up to 24 hours of battery life.
specifications: Noise canceling, 24-hour battery, Bluetooth 5.1, Lightweight design

name: Apple Watch Series 9 45mm
description: Most advanced Apple Watch with S9 chip, Double Tap gesture, and Precision Finding for iPhone. Features Always-On Retina display, ECG app, and comprehensive health tracking.
specifications: 45mm case, S9 chip, GPS + Cellular, Always-On Retina display

name: Samsung Galaxy Watch6 Classic
description: Premium smartwatch with rotating bezel, comprehensive health monitoring, and Wear OS powered by Samsung. Features sleep coaching, body composition analysis, and GPS tracking.
specifications: 43mm case, Exynos W930, Wear OS, Rotating bezel, GPS

name: Canon EOS R6 Mark II
description: Full-frame mirrorless camera with 24.2MP sensor, advanced autofocus, and 4K video recording. Perfect for professional photography and videography with in-body image stabilization.
specifications: 24.2MP full-frame, DIGIC X processor, 4K video, In-body IS

name: Sony Alpha a7 IV
description: Versatile full-frame camera with 33MP resolution, real-time tracking autofocus, and 4K 60p video. Ideal for both photography and videography with advanced image processing.
specifications: 33MP full-frame, BIONZ XR processor, 4K 60p video, Real-time tracking

name: PlayStation 5
description: Next-generation gaming console with custom SSD, 3D audio, and DualSense controller with haptic feedback. Experience lightning-fast loading and immersive gaming with ray tracing support.
specifications: Custom AMD Zen 2 CPU, RDNA 2 GPU, 825GB SSD, 4K gaming

name: Xbox Series X
description: Most powerful Xbox ever with 12 teraflops of processing power, 4K gaming, and Quick Resume feature. Backward compatible with thousands of games across four generations of Xbox.
specifications: Custom AMD Zen 2 CPU, RDNA 2 GPU, 1TB SSD, 4K 120fps gaming

name: Nintendo Switch OLED
description: Handheld gaming console with vibrant 7-inch OLED screen, enhanced audio, and versatile play modes. Play at home on TV or on-the-go with the same great Nintendo games.
specifications: 7-inch OLED display, Custom NVIDIA Tegra, 64GB storage, Detachable Joy-Con

name: LG 27UP850-W 4K Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with USB-C connectivity, HDR10 support, and 99% sRGB color gamut. Perfect for creative professionals with height-adjustable stand and multiple ports.
specifications: 27-inch 4K UHD, IPS panel, USB-C 96W, HDR10, Height adjustable

name: ASUS ProArt PA278QV
description: Professional 27-inch monitor with 100% sRGB and Rec. 709 color accuracy, factory calibration, and ergonomic design. Ideal for photo editing, graphic design, and content creation.
specifications: 27-inch WQHD, IPS panel, 100% sRGB, Factory calibrated, Ergonomic stand

name: Logitech MX Keys
description: Advanced wireless keyboard with smart illumination, perfect key stability, and multi-device connectivity. Features spherically-dished keys and smart backlighting that adjusts to conditions.
specifications: Wireless, Backlit keys, Multi-device, USB-C charging, 10-day battery

name: Logitech MX Master 3S
description: Advanced wireless mouse with ultra-precise scrolling, customizable buttons, and ergonomic design. Features Darkfield tracking technology and works on virtually any surface.
specifications: Wireless, 8K DPI sensor, Darkfield tracking, USB-C charging, Multi-device

name: Sonos One Gen 2
description: Smart speaker with rich, room-filling sound, built-in Alexa and Google Assistant, and AirPlay 2 support. Features Trueplay tuning technology for optimized sound in any room.
specifications: Wi-Fi enabled, Voice control, AirPlay 2, Trueplay tuning, Multi-room audio

name: JBL Charge 5
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound, IP67 waterproof rating, and built-in power bank. Features JBL Pro Sound with optimized long excursion driver and dual JBL bass radiators.
specifications: Bluetooth 5.1, IP67 waterproof, 20-hour battery, Power bank function

name: Samsung T7 Portable SSD 1TB
description: Ultra-fast portable SSD with USB 3.2 Gen 2 interface, delivering up to 1,050 MB/s transfer speeds. Compact, lightweight design with password protection and AES 256-bit hardware encryption.
specifications: 1TB capacity, USB 3.2 Gen 2, 1,050 MB/s speed, Hardware encryption

name: WD My Passport 4TB
description: Portable hard drive with automatic backup software, password protection, and hardware encryption. Compact design with USB 3.0 connectivity for reliable storage on-the-go.
specifications: 4TB capacity, USB 3.0, Hardware encryption, Automatic backup software

name: Anker PowerCore 10000 PD
description: Compact power bank with 10,000mAh capacity, Power Delivery fast charging, and PowerIQ technology. Features USB-C and USB-A ports for charging multiple devices simultaneously.
specifications: 10,000mAh capacity, Power Delivery, USB-C + USB-A, PowerIQ technology

name: Apple MagSafe Charger
description: Wireless charger designed for iPhone 12 and later models with magnetic alignment for optimal charging efficiency. Provides up to 15W of wireless charging power with compatible devices.
specifications: Magnetic alignment, 15W wireless charging, USB-C cable, iPhone 12+ compatible

name: Peak Design Everyday Backpack 20L
description: Professional camera and laptop backpack with weatherproof construction, customizable internal dividers, and side access. Perfect for photographers and creative professionals on-the-go.
specifications: 20L capacity, Weatherproof, Customizable dividers, Side access, Laptop compartment

name: Fitbit Charge 6
description: Advanced fitness tracker with built-in GPS, heart rate monitoring, and Google apps integration. Features 6+ day battery life, sleep tracking, and 40+ exercise modes for comprehensive health monitoring.
specifications: Built-in GPS, Heart rate monitor, 6-day battery, 40+ exercise modes, Google Pay

name: Nest Thermostat
description: Smart thermostat that learns your schedule and preferences to help save energy. Features remote control via smartphone app, energy history, and compatibility with most heating and cooling systems.
specifications: Learning algorithm, Remote control, Energy saving, HVAC compatible, Google Assistant

name: Philips Hue White and Color Starter Kit
description: Smart lighting system with millions of colors, dimming capabilities, and voice control compatibility. Includes 3 bulbs and Hue Bridge for creating the perfect ambiance in any room.
specifications: 16 million colors, Voice control, Dimming, 3 bulbs + Bridge, App control
